data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during AMICITIA cruise from Nederland to Batavia started at 1849-06-03
Ship: Amicitia, Voyage: Nederland - Batavia, 1st Observer: G. Abrahams Jr. (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
